short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Terry Crews saves your wallet, cent by cent

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Terry Crews (or any picture) saves you from buying useless stuff from the internet.
Open Source github.com/MonkeySlut
Currently only works for ebay. amazon and asos are in the works :)
